content:
As Shavez recovered from his injuries, he couldn't shake the feeling that something was off about Emaad. His brother's personality seemed to have changed, and he was becoming more and more rude and aggressive.

Shavez tried to brush it off at first, telling himself that his brother was just going through a tough time. But as the days passed, he knew that something wasn't right.

One day, as he was going through some of Emaad's things, he noticed that his necklace was missing. The necklace was a special gift that Shavez had given to Emaad on his 13th birthday, and he knew that his brother never took it off.

That's when Shavez realized that something was terribly wrong. He had a hunch that his brother had been kidnapped, and that this person pretending to be Emaad was a decoy.

Determined to find the real Emaad and bring him home safely, Shavez set out on a mission to track down his brother. It wasn't easy, but he refused to give up.

And after weeks of searching, he finally found Emaad. His brother had been kidnapped by a group of unscrupulous people who had hoped to use him as a pawn in their criminal schemes.

Shavez was overjoyed to be reunited with his brother, and he vowed to never let anything like this happen again. Together, the brothers were stronger than ever, and they knew that they could face any challenge that came their way. The end.
